DOC.brief_summary: Derris Scandens Benth ( family : Leguminosae ) woody vine grow throughout Southeast Asia , include Thailand . The stem D.Scandens widely use Thai traditional medicine , foe example myalgia . Previous study show D.Scandens Benth extract anti-inflammatory activity . Although NSAIDs efficaciously treatment osteoarthritis , GI side effect still concern . In study aim investigate efficacy safety D. Scandens Benth extract compare Naproxen therapy patient knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Derris Scandens Benth Extract VS Naproxen Knee OA
DOC.criteria: Age > =50 yr Known case primary knee osteoarthritis WOMAC pain subscale ( item1 ) > = 5 sign inform consent hypersensitive NSAIDs history peptic ulcer melena unable walk , i.e . patient severe spinal stenosis , myocardial infarction history intraarticular injection knee within 3 month status post knee replacement
